Type.Name: WebException

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WebException extends System.InvalidOperationException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

remarks.para: The class is thrown by classes descended from and that implement pluggable protocols for accessing the Internet.
When is thrown by a descendant of the class, the property provides the Internet response to the application.

summary.para: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs while accessing the network through a pluggable protocol.

.property instance class System.Net.WebResponse Response

value.para: A instance containing the error response if one is available; otherwise, .

remarks.para: Some Internet protocols, such as HTTP, return otherwise valid responses indicating that an error has occurred at the protocol level. When the response to an Internet request indicates an error, sets the property to and provides the that contains the error message in the property of the that was thrown. The application can examine the to determine the actual error.

summary.para: Gets the response that the remote host returned.
